full_threads.body:
Your calendar is your canvas 🎨
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
With Events Calendar Pro, the sky's the limit for personalization. Here's how to create a beautiful, custom calendar, even if you're not a designer or a developer.
How to customize your calendar 🖌
Basic customizations
Use the WordPress Customizer to easily change your calendar colors.
Learn how
Template settings
Configure your events template and views settings or disable certain elements.
Learn how
Advanced customizations
Enable custom HTML content above and below your calendar.
Learn how
Template overrides
Customize the calendar's template files to create a personalized appearance.
Learn how
Stay awesome,
The Events Calendar Team 🤘
